import React from "react"; import classnames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardImg, CardTitle, Form, Input, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, InputGroup, Container, Row, Col, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem } from "reactstrap"; import axios from 'axios'; // core components import LoginNavbar from "components/Navbars/LoginNavbar.jsx"; class Register extends React.Component { state = { squares1to6: "", squares7and8: "", user: {}, paymentMethods: [] }; async componentWillMount () { this.setState({ roles: await this.fetchRoles(), paymentMethods: await this.fetchPaymentMethods() }) } componentDidMount () { document.body.classList.toggle("register-page"); } componentWillUnmount () { document.body.classList.toggle("register-page"); } async fetchRoles () { try { const roles = await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/roles') return roles.data } catch (e) { console.error(e.message) } return [] } async fetchPaymentMethods () { try { const paymentMethods = await axios.get('http://localhost:3001/payment_methods') return paymentMethods.data } catch (e) { console.log(e.message) } return [] } render() { return ( <>
Register
this.setState({ emailFocus: true })} onBlur={e => this.setState({ emailFocus: false })} /> this.setState({ passwordFocus: true }) } onBlur={e => this.setState({ passwordFocus: false }) } /> this.setState({ passwordFocus: true }) } onBlur={e => this.setState({ passwordFocus: false }) } /> Payment method... { this.state.paymentMethods.map(paymentMethod => ({ paymentMethod.name })) }
); } } export default Register;
